mapper.insert: INSERT INTO applications (name, dob, tel, email, level, sp_product, message) VALUES (#{name}, #{dob}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{level}, #{sp_product}, #{message})
mapper.select: SELECT application_id, name, created_at, tel, email, level, sp_product, message, status FROM applications WHERE status != 'receipt' OR status IS NULL OR status = '' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
